newsitem.title: GREECE: GREEK DEP UPS GASOLINE, DIESEL PRICES THURSDAY.
newsitem.headline: GREEK DEP UPS GASOLINE, DIESEL PRICES THURSDAY.

text.p: Greece's Public Petroleum Corporation (DEP) said in a statement that gasoline and diesel prices will be raised for a week by 0.90 drachmas per littre and 1.70 drachmas per litre respectively, effective Thursday.

The increases in the prices of gasoline and diesel are due to the rise of world gasoline and diesel prices and the appreciation of the dollar against the drachma by 0.90 drachmas, it said. --Dimitris Kontogiannis, Athens Newsroom +301 3311812-4
